name: Double Cross (itch) (Gan_HOPE326)
description:
An abstract arcade game made in 72 hours for #scorejam. 

Enclosed in a single room, move around to barely dodge the bullets, and gain points. Blue boxes are flying around to make your life harder - each of them will remap your controls in different ways! Can you fly with an axis inverted? What about both? What if left is up, and up is down? The more your controls are scrambled, the higher the multiplier on your score goes! Compare your results with scores from all across the world!

How to play:

In the main menu, type your nickname after "Welcome" so that it will be used to store your scores, then click "Play".

In game, the controls are the arrow keys or the left stick of your gamepad. As to what they will do, well... that depends!

Details:

The game was made with Godot Engine. Every asset was created by me. 

Graphics were made using Inkscape. 

Music was created with Google's Chrome Music Lab. 

Scoreboard services are provided through SilentWolf.

The font is Alata Regular, licensed under the SIL Open Font License.
